channel.title: [PI]gmaul spec
channel.description: how dlo i add gmaul spec to a PI? it has the gmaul the spec bar but it doesnet select the spec?? in most PI this happens?

item.title: [PI]gmaul spec
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

In CombatAssistant.java above case 4587: // dscimmy c.gfx100(347); c.specEffect = 1; c.startAnimation(1872); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break; put in case 4153: // maul c.startAnimation(1667); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); /*if (c.playerIndex > 0) gmaulPlayer(i); else gmaulNpc(i);*/ c.gfx100(337); break;
Secondly under case 4151: case 11694: case 15027: case 11698: put in case 4153:
Thirdly, Under case 6528: c.playerStandIndex = 0x811; c.playerWalkIndex = 2064; c.playerRunIndex = 1664; break; enter in case 4153: c.playerStandIndex = 1662; c.playerWalkIndex = 1663; c.playerRunIndex = 1664; break;
than under switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) { put in case 4153;//granite maul break;
under switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) { put in case 4153: return 1666;
Than after that under public void handleGmaulPlayer() { put in if (c.playerIndex > 0) { Client o = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]; if (c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), o.getX(), o.getY(), getRequiredDistance())) { if (checkReqs()) { if (checkSpecAmount(4153)) { boolean hit = Misc.random(calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence()); int damage = 0; if (hit) damage = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit()); if (o.prayerActive[18] || o.curseActive[9] && System.currentTimeMillis() - o.protMeleeDelay > 1500) damage *= .6; o.handleHitMask(damage); c.startAnimation(1667); c.gfx100(340); o.dealDamage(damage); } } } } }

Hope it works!
